title: Little Nicky
short_plot_summary: The youngest son of Satan, Nicky, must travel to Earth to save his father and stop his two older brothers from creating a new hell on our planet.
explanation: A devil face, representing Nicky, the main character who's the son of Satan
A fire, symbolizing hell where Nicky and his family reside
A bird, representing Nicky's talking bird friend, Mr. Beefy, who helps him throughout the movie
A guitar, showcasing the film's references to rock music and its influence on the story
A cityscape, illustrating the movie's setting in New York City where Nicky ventures to save his father and stop his brothers
